About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Wei. I'm a new graduate from Pearson Electrotechnology Centre, Computer Support & Networks. I'm currently looking for a job as a junior software developer. I have experience of front-end development as well as full stack development. Check my website for more details. I'm also a big fan of Photography. I have been a contributor to istock Photo(Getty Image) and Adobe Stock for years. Go and check my pictures on their website if you are interested.
